contentrichtext.text: {{refimprove|date=October 2012}} {{notability|date=October 2012}} '''Adagio''' is a [[computer program]] which runs on only [[server (computing)|servers]], for the [[peer-to-peer]] [[Gnutella2]] [[computer network]]. It is a client which runs on multiple [[operating system]]s. It behaves like a [[BitTorrent tracker|tracker]] in the [[BitTorrent (protocol)|BitTorrent protocol]], by providing an initial source, [[SHA1]] and [[Merkle tree|Tiger tree hash]] information, as well as alternate locations of files in the network. It is written in the [[programming language]] [[Ada (programming language)|Ada]]. ==External links== *{{official website|http://agio.sourceforge.net}} {{network-software-stub}} {{File sharing}} {{Gnutella2|Gnutella clients}} [[Category:File sharing programs]]
